articles.title: Inside the Numbers: How Indiana and Miami stack up going into CFP national championship game - AP News
articles.description: Indiana quarterback Fernando Mendoza originally planned to attend Yale, where he was recruited five years ago. Yale highlighted its history, including Heisman Trophy winners Larry Kelly and Clint Frank. Mendoza won the Heisman this season. Yale is the only ma…
articles.content:
MIAMI GARDENS, Fla. (AP) Indiana quarterback Fernando Mendoza originally planned on going to Yale, which pulled out all the stops during his recruiting visit five years ago.

articles.author: Christoph Hasselbach
articles.title: Why Germany, India face obstacles to closer strategic ties - DW.com
articles.description: In the face of US tariffs, Russian threats and China's ambitions, Germany is courting the Asian giant as a trading and geopolitical partner. But it's not so easy.
articles.content: Top German politicians have a new favorite travel destination: India. Following the recent visit by Foreign Minister Johann Wadephul, Chancellor Friedrich Merz is heading to New Delhi on Sunday with … [+6354 chars]
